content: this pattern is written in english using u s crochet terms skill level easy supplies needed ✨yarn 6 super bulky bernat blanket ✨hooks l 8mm hook additional smaller hook may be needed to finish the tail ✨tools & notions scissors yarn needle stitch markers ✨other materials poly-fil stuffing 2 black 8mm safety eyes copyright © 2023 mama crochetti do not alter duplicate redistribute or sell pattern intended for personal use only feel free to sell your products made using this pattern please credit mama crochetti all photos are copyright and should never be used to sell your products
